title: Here are some of the best protective cases and lanyards for the new AirPods 4
description: Apple’s AirPods 4 are available in two different versions: one with ANC active noise cancellation and support for MagSafe chargers. And if you have AirPods 4, read on as we’ve put together a list of some of the best protective cases and lanyards for Apple’s wireless earbuds. more…
author: Filipe Espósito
excerpt: Apple’s AirPods 4 are available in two different versions: one with ANC active noise cancellation and support for MagSafe chargers....
text: Apple’s AirPods 4 are available in two different versions: one with ANC active noise cancellation and support for MagSafe chargers. And if you have AirPods 4, read on as we’ve put together a list of some of the best protective cases and lanyards for Apple’s wireless earbuds. Cases for AirPods 4 AirPods come in a charging case that also protects the earbuds when they’re not in use. However, some users may want to add extra protection with an external case, or simply want a decorative case. ESR, a popular accessory maker for Apple devices, has different cases for AirPods 4. One of them, Cloud, has a soft finish and a cleaner look, while the other (Orbit) is made of hard plastic and has a more detailed finish. ESR also has the Cyber series with a more rugged design for full protection. They’re available in a variety of colors. ESR Cloud Case for AirPods 4: $9.99 ESR Orbit Case for AirPods 4: $11.99 ESR Cyber Case for AirPods 4: $12.99 Another popular case for AirPods 4 is the silicone case made by ORNARTO, which covers the entire charging case with double-layer protection. The case is available in 17 beautiful colors and also comes with a lanyard. ORNARTO Case for AirPods 4: $12.99 ORNARTO also has an even more resistant case made of premium TPU with an irridescent finish, which is available in five different colors – and it comes with a lanyard. ORNARTO Iridescent Case for AirPods 4: $17.99 If you’re looking for more fun-looking cases, DamonLight has an amazing game controller case for AirPods 4 that’s also shockproof and comes with a keychain. Another cool option is the Elago case inspired by Nintendo’s Game Boy. And if you prefer something more flower-inspired, the Maxjoy case is just what you need. DamonLight Game Case for AirPods 4: $7.99 Elago Game Boy Case for AirPods 4: $12.99 Maxjoy Case for AirPods 4: $9.98 Spigen also has a sturdy case with a matte black finish for AirPods 4, and it is MagSafe compatible. And why not buy a VEIRRW Clear Case to preserve Apple’s original design? Spigen Rugged Armor Case for AirPods 4: $19.99 VEIRRW Clear Case for AirPods 4: $6.95 Lanyards Although only the AirPods Pro 2 charging case comes with a lanyard slot, most protective cases for AirPods also come with one. This means you can customize your AirPods further by choosing a different lanyard. Here are a few options: HiFan Lanyard for AirPods case: $6.99 Oakxco Lanyard for AirPods case: $6.99 Spigen Lanyard for AirPods case: $11.99 Best deals on AirPods and Beats: AirPods 4: from $129 to $99 AirPods 4 with ANC: from $179 to $148 AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C case: from $249 to $169 Powerbeats Pro 2: $249 Beats Pill: from $149 to $129 Is there another cool accessory for AirPods that should be on the list? Let us know in the comments section below. Add 9to5Mac to your Google News feed.  FTC: We use income earning auto affiliate links. More.
html:
Apple’s AirPods 4 are available in two different versions: one with ANC active noise cancellation and support for MagSafe chargers. And if you have AirPods 4, read on as we’ve put together a list of some of the best protective cases and lanyards for Apple’s wireless earbuds.

Cases for AirPods 4

AirPods come in a charging case that also protects the earbuds when they’re not in use. However, some users may want to add extra protection with an external case, or simply want a decorative case.

ESR, a popular accessory maker for Apple devices, has different cases for AirPods 4. One of them, Cloud, has a soft finish and a cleaner look, while the other (Orbit) is made of hard plastic and has a more detailed finish. ESR also has the Cyber series with a more rugged design for full protection. They’re available in a variety of colors.

  • ESR Cloud Case for AirPods 4: $9.99
  • ESR Orbit Case for AirPods 4: $11.99
  • ESR Cyber Case for AirPods 4: $12.99

Another popular case for AirPods 4 is the silicone case made by ORNARTO, which covers the entire charging case with double-layer protection. The case is available in 17 beautiful colors and also comes with a lanyard.

  • ORNARTO Case for AirPods 4: $12.99

ORNARTO also has an even more resistant case made of premium TPU with an irridescent finish, which is available in five different colors – and it comes with a lanyard.

  • ORNARTO Iridescent Case for AirPods 4: $17.99

If you’re looking for more fun-looking cases, DamonLight has an amazing game controller case for AirPods 4 that’s also shockproof and comes with a keychain. Another cool option is the Elago case inspired by Nintendo’s Game Boy. And if you prefer something more flower-inspired, the Maxjoy case is just what you need.

  • DamonLight Game Case for AirPods 4: $7.99
  • Elago Game Boy Case for AirPods 4: $12.99
  • Maxjoy Case for AirPods 4: $9.98

Spigen also has a sturdy case with a matte black finish for AirPods 4, and it is MagSafe compatible. And why not buy a VEIRRW Clear Case to preserve Apple’s original design?

  • Spigen Rugged Armor Case for AirPods 4: $19.99
  • VEIRRW Clear Case for AirPods 4: $6.95

Lanyards

Although only the AirPods Pro 2 charging case comes with a lanyard slot, most protective cases for AirPods also come with one. This means you can customize your AirPods further by choosing a different lanyard. Here are a few options:

  • HiFan Lanyard for AirPods case: $6.99
  • Oakxco Lanyard for AirPods case: $6.99
  • Spigen Lanyard for AirPods case: $11.99

Best deals on AirPods and Beats:

  • AirPods 4: from $129 to $99
  • AirPods 4 with ANC: from $179 to $148
  • AirPods Pro 2 with USB-C case: from $249 to $169
  • Powerbeats Pro 2: $249
  • Beats Pill: from $149 to $129

Is there another cool accessory for AirPods that should be on the list? Let us know in the comments section below.

Add 9to5Mac to your Google News feed. 

FTC: We use income earning auto affiliate links. More.
